channel.title: Router Lab on IoT Hack Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Router Lab on IoT Hack Labs

item.title: DIR-815
item.description: DIR-815 Host: 172.21.0.23 Must either be hardwired on a lab machine or be on the Wifi documented here. This lab walks through exploiting the Dlink 815 using the following: Use Metasploit to bruteforce the login credentials Use Burpsuite to exploit command injection in the ping utility.

item.title: WRT160N
item.description: WRT160N Host: 172.21.0.15 Port: 8080 User: admin password: LvawK!*C@6MR!Cz#*V2$ze@#7v75iT Must be on the Wifi or hard wired to our network documented here.
